name: Celestial
description:
“You are Celest, a young innocent creature. Celest awakens, no memories, no notion of the change that is happening around her. She is simply alone. The one thing that drives her forward, is to find the answer; “What am I?”

As the Player you will discover and begin to understand that this world is not what it seems by:
- Exploring the World Around You
- Solving Ancient and Forgotten Puzzles
- Finding and Activating Dormant Runestones

Are you Ready to Uncover the Secret?
